episode.title: かぐや様は許せない / かぐや様は許したい / 白銀御行は出かけたい
Kaguya Won`t Forgive / Kaguya Wants to Forgive / Miyuki Shirogane Wants to Go Somewhere
Kaguya-sama wa Yurusenai / Kaguya-sama wa Yurushitai / Shirogane Miyuki wa Dekaketai
辉夜大小姐不允许/辉夜大小姐想原谅/白银御行想出门
episode.summary: Kaguya and Shirogane had an argument over the "home visit incident" and as they`re both unable to be honest about their feelings, a hostile mood pervades the student council room. Since Kashiwagi has a boyfriend, Kaguya goes to her for "romantic advice," although she lies, saying she`s "asking for a friend." Meanwhile, when Shirogane asks romcom fan Ishigami how he can make up with the "person of the opposite sex" he had a fight with, the class treasurer goes off on a heated rant... After getting an earful of various advice, Kaguya and Shirogane begin to realize how they really feel about each other. Source: crunchyroll
